field_description: unique combination of report_id, outbreak_id, and species (this field is generated by EHA)
id of the report
id of the outbreak/cluster
name of species
for most events, this is the same as epi_event_id. for events with reporting by strain or serotype, the epi_event_id is combined with the strain or serotype (this field is generated by EHA)
"in" if the report is an immediate notification and "fur" if the report is a follow-up report
rank of the report in the event
national reference of the report (optional)
date of the report
national reference of the outbreak/cluster (optional)
date of start of the outbreak/cluster
date of end of the outbreak/cluster
"faux" for outbreak, and "vrai" for cluster of several outbreaks
"1" for outbreak, and a number greater than 1 shows the number of outbreaks in the cluster
epidemiological unit of the outbreak/cluster
longitude of the outbreak/cluster
latitude of the outbreak/cluster
"false" for exact location, "true" for approximate location
location of the outbreak/cluster
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (lowest level of areas)
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (lowest level of areas)
name of the area of the outbreak/cluster (lowest level of areas)
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (medium level of areas)
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (medium level of areas)
name of the area of the outbreak/cluster (medium level of areas)
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (larger level of areas)
id of the area of the outbreak/cluster (larger level of areas)
name of the area of the outbreak/cluster (larger level of areas)
id of the area of the country/territory
id of the area of the country/territory
name of the area of the country/territory
"true" for outbreaks/clusters in wild species, "false" for outbreaks/clusters in domestic species
type of wildlife (only relevant for recent outbreaks/clusters in wild species)
type of water (only relevant for diseases of aquatic animals)
unit of counting cases
number of units of susceptible animals in the outbreak/cluster
number of units of affected animals in the outbreak/cluster
number of units of dead animals in the outbreak/cluster
number of units of animals killed and disposed of in the outbreak/cluster
number of units of animals slaughtered/killed for commercial use in the outbreak/cluster
number of units of animals vaccinated in response to the outbreak/cluster
% morbidity, by species by outbreak/cluster (only available for recent outbreaks/clusters)
% mortality, by species by outbreak/cluster (only available for recent outbreaks/clusters)
